ai_limit_reached: AI limit reached. Prioritizing highest risk items.
ioc_limit_reached: IOC limit reached. Analyzing statistical sample.
language_changed_text: The language change will be applied the next time you open the program.
ioc_input_label: Enter Targets (IPs, URLs - one per line)
cli_help_more_info: For more help on a specific command, use:
cli_ioc_example1_desc: Analyze multiple targets directly and generate an AI summary
cli_ioc_example2_desc: Read targets from a text file
cli_repo_example1_desc: Analyze a repository and generate a summary with the 'mistral' model
cli_config_example3_desc: Set a new location for the log file
cli_config_example4_desc: Set the application language to English
cli_config_app_help: Manage ThreatDeflect API keys and settings.
cli_ioc_arg_targets_help: One or more IPs/URLs to analyze.
cli_ioc_option_file_help: Read targets from a text file (one per line).
cli_ioc_option_output_help: Path of the Excel file to save the report.
cli_option_ai_help: Generate a summary with the specified local AI model (e.g., llama3).
cli_error_no_targets: No targets provided. Use arguments or the --file option.
cli_warning_no_valid_targets: No valid targets were provided for analysis.
cli_analysis_failed: Analysis failed. Check threatdeflect.log for details.
cli_repo_option_output_help: Path of the Excel file to save the report.
cli_config_set_arg_key_help: Your API key for the service.
cli_success_key_saved: API key for '{service}' has been saved securely.
cli_config_set_ollama_arg_endpoint_help: The full endpoint URL, e.g., http://localhost:11434/api/generate
cli_config_set_log_path_help: Set the path for the log file.
cli_config_set_log_path_arg_path_help: The full path for the file, e.g., C:\Logs\threatdeflect.log
cli_success_log_path_set: Log path set to '{path}'. The change will take effect on the next run.
cli_config_set_lang_help: Set the application language (e.g., pt_br, en_us).
cli_error_lang_not_supported: Language '{lang}' not supported. Use one of the following: {supported_langs}
cli_success_lang_set: Language set to '{lang}'. The change will take effect on the next run.
